glsa.title: RoundCube: Security bypass
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in RoundCube may allow authenticated users to bypass security restrictions.

background.p: Free and open source webmail software for the masses, written in PHP.

description.p: Authenticated users can arbitrarily reset passwords due to a problem caused by an improperly restricted exec call in the virtualmin and sasl drivers of the password plugin.

impact.p: Authenticated users can bypass security restrictions and elevate privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All RoundCube users should upgrade to the latest version:
